connect_help_text: Please connect wallet to continue playing.

checkWL.desc: Only the whitelisted accounts are qualified to mint Otto Portals at the Whitelist-only Sale. Connect wallet to see if you’re on the list!
checkWL.has-wl-desc: Get ready! Your Otto Portals will be able to mint at {{time}}
checkWL.no-wl-desc: Don’t worry. You can join your Discord, and prepare for the Public Sale at {{time}}.
checkWL.title: Check if you’re Whitelisted

hero.desc: Mint Otto Portal and summon your unique Otto NFTs. Otto? Lottie? Cleo? It’s all surprise!
hero.subtitle: Summon your own Otto NFTs
hero.title: Otto Portals

intro.step1_desc:
We accept $CLAM and ETH for Otto Portal minting. However, we're offering a 30% discount when you pay with $CLAM. This is a simple way to save money while supporting the continued growth of the Otter Kingdom.

1 Portal = 0.08 ETH
intro.step1_title: Mint Otto Portal with CLAM or ETH
intro.step2_desc: Otto Portals need time to power up. Once they are ready, you will be able to summon your Otto.
intro.step2_title: Wait for your Otto Portal to activate
intro.step3_desc:
When the time is up, you will be able to summon your Otto.

1 portal can only summon 1 Otto. The traits will be randomly generated the moment you summon a Otto. If you're lucky, you'll summon an Otto that possesses rare, or super rare traits that greatly increase your Otto's value.
intro.title: How do Otto Portals work?

mint.info_desc: One portal mints one Otto. Mint portals to summon your Otto and begin your Otterverse adventure!
mint.title: Mint Portal

mint.please_connect: Please connect your wallet to proceed the process.

popup.processing: Processing... Please do not close the window. The transaction will be finished soon.

mint.title: Mint Portals

my_portals.legendary_desc: Legendary Ottos deserve legendary owners. Are you up for the challenge?
my_portals.no_portal: You don't have any portal yet.

state.OPENED: The portal is now open, but only one Otto can be summoned. Choose wisely.

my_portals.title: My Portals

portal.candidates_title: Choose your Otto to join the Otter Kingdom:
portal.open_desc_2: waiting at this portal, but you still need one more step to summon an Otto to go through the portal. Once it’s confirmed, the portal NFT’s appearance will be changed to the Otto’s!

open_popup.desc_one: Your Otto is ready to join the Otterverse, but you still need to go back to summon this Otto through the portal.
open_popup.desc_other: They are ready to enter the Otterverse, but each portal only has the power to transport one Otto. Head back to the summon page to pick your favorite Otto. Choose wisely!
open_popup.headline_1: Don’t fret. You might have the best Otto yet!
open_popup.headline_3: One for me, three for thee!
open_popup.headline_4: Four is more, but you need a super rare score!
open_popup.headline_5: Now this is what I call a selection!
open_popup.headline_7: Seven is heaven! Which will you choose?
open_popup.headline_8: Eight is great…but wait! Who do I take?
open_popup.title_one: There is {{count}} Otto at the portal
open_popup.title_other: There are {{count}} Ottos at the portal

portal.otto_candidate_desc: The attribute values and rarity score will reveal after you summon this Otto

state.CAN_OPEN: This Portal is ready to initiate!
state.OPENED: The portal is now open, but only one Otto can be summoned. Choose wisely.

my_ottos.title: My Ottos
my_ottos.no_otto: You don't have any otto yet.
